title: Euro zone benchmark German 10-year bond yields hits three-week low to 2.4% amid Trump tariffs-led impact
description:
Euro zone benchmark German bond yields were on track on Friday for their biggest weekly decline since mid-April as investors focused on the long-term adverse economic impact of U.S. trade policy.

Germany's 10-year government bond yield was set for a 5-basis-point weekly drop, particularly after fal...
